original_title: Operation Shark Attack #1: Operation Shark Attack
overview: Renowned shark experts and underwater filmmakers Ron and Valerie Taylor take their cameras to the picture-perfect waters of Australia's Great Barrier Reef to document and study the region's dense shark population. Focusing on the behavior exhibited during a feeding frenzy, the Taylors dive into chum-filled waters outfitted in steel mesh suits to get up close and personal with world's most enigmatic predators.
title: Operation Shark Attack #1: Operation Shark Attack
